gurmukhi: ਦੋੳੂ ਕ੍ਰੂਰ ਕਰਮੰ ਦੋੳੂ ਜਾਨੁ ਬਾਹੰ ||
transliteration: Dooo Kroor Karamannd Dooo Jaan(u) Baahan||
translation: Both the heroes of violent actions had long arms like gods.
Both were great kings with extraordinary knowledge of Hindusim.7.225.

gurmukhi: ਦੋੳੂ ਸਸਤ੍ਰ ਧਾਰੰ ਦੋੳੂ ਪਰਮ ਦਾਨੰ ||
transliteration: Dooo Sastra Dhaaran Dooo Param Daanan||
translation: Both were weapon-wielders and supreme donors.
Both were Indians and capable of protecting themselves with their shields.
Both were the users of their arms and were kings with canopies.
Both were Supreme warriors and great fighters.8.226.

gurmukhi: ਦੋੳੂ ਖੰਡ ਖੰਡੀ ਦੋੳੂ ਮੰਡ ਮੰਡੰ ||
translation: Both were the destroyers of their enemies and also their establishers.
Both were the terrible conquerors of the great heroes.

gurmukhi: ਦੋੳੂ ਬੀਰ ਬਾਨੀ ਦੋੳੂ ਬਾਹ ਸਾਹੰ ||
translation: Both the warriors were adept in shooting arrows and had mighty arms.
Both the heroes were the sun and moon of their forces.9.227.

gurmukhi: ਦੋੳੂ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਵਰਤੀ ਦੋੳੂ ਸਸਤ੍ਰ ਬੇਤਾ ||
translation: Both were the warriors universal monarchs and had knowledge of warfare.

gurmukhi: ਦੋੳੂ ਜੰਗ ਜੋਧੀ ਦੋੳੂ ਜੰਗ ਜੇਤਾ ||
translation: Both were the warriors of war and conquerors of war.

gurmukhi: ਦੋੳੂ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਜੋਤੀ ਦੋੳੂ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਚਾਪੰ ||
translation: Both were marvelously beautiful carrying beautiful bows.

gurmukhi: ਦੋੳੂ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਵਰਮੰ ਦੋੳੂ ਦੁਸਟ ਤਾਪੰ ||੧੦||੨੨੮||
transliteration: Dooo Chitra Varman Dooo Doust Taapan||10||228||
translation: Both were clad in armour and were the destroyers of enemies.10.228.
